subject: Re: Acer TravelMate 4222WLMi
body:
Try to boot ubuntu, try to boot knoppix, look what will happen,
write down, which components are functional.
If one cd boot, start a terminal and type "lspci"
Write down the output and search for "linux" and "on Comonentname" at
google or yahoo.
This gives you an overview !
Best regards
Kai Bausch

Tim Frink schrieb:
> Hi,
